<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.Incident</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Use this script include to overrride the behaviour of IncidentSNC</description> <name>Incident</name> <script><![CDATA[var Incident = Class.create(); Incident.prototype = Object.extendsObject(IncidentSNC, {
initialize: function(incidentGr) { IncidentSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this, incidentGr); },
type: 'Incident' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-11-09 11:27:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>39f705729f2302000391b89a442e707a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Incident</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Incident" source="com.snc.incident">9ee0858b6d2620100acb70b353433015</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_39f705729f2302000391b89a442e707a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-11-17 18:44:03</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>214</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
